official_title: A bill to provide that Members of Congress will be treated in the same manner as other taxpayers with respect to the deductibility of living expenses while away from home in the pursuit of a trade or business.

summary.text: Rescinds any legislation granting Members of Congress an income tax deduction for living expenses if any other taxpayer would not be entitled to such a deduction for similar expenses.
